General.Name: E3 Metals Corp
General.Description: E3 Lithium Limited engages in the development and extraction of lithium properties in Alberta. The company was formerly known as E3 Metals Corp. and changed its name to E3 Lithium Limited in July 2022. E3 Lithium Limited is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 300 5th Avenue SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 3C4

1.Name: Mr. Christopher  Doornbos B.Sc (Hons), MAusimm, P.Geo, P.Geo.
1.Title: CEO, Pres & Director
